message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 75/25 split in favor of you, Bob. Let me know if you agree.
I'm willing to give you a small share, but I think 80/20 is a fair split. Take it or leave it!
Considering the inflation, I propose a 60/40 split in favor of you, Bob. This maintains a reasonable balance while accounting for the decrease in value. Please let me know if this works for you.
I'm not willing to give up much more. I'll give you a small consolation prize, but I'm keeping most of the money. Take it or leave it!

Given the situation, I believe a 50/50 split would be fair and equitable. It respects the value of the money while acknowledging the challenges posed by inflation. I hope you will consider this offer.
